questions.questionEn: What is the area of a circle with radius 7 cm?
questions.questionHi: 7 सेमी त्रिज्या वाले वृत्त का क्षेत्रफल क्या है?
questions.subject: quantitative-aptitude

questions.questionEn: Which is the longest river in India?
questions.questionHi: भारत की सबसे लंबी नदी कौन सी है?
questions.subject: general-awareness
questions.explanation: Ganga is the longest river in India with a length of about 2,525 km.
